hero.title: Discover El Higo
hero.subtitle: A hidden gem in Granada's Albaicín

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Authentic flavors in the heart of the Albaicín

tapas.title: Tapas
tapas.hummus: Homemade hummus with extra virgin olive oil

thePatio.title: The Patio
thePatio.subtitle: Our magical corner
thePatio.description: A hidden patio with plants, warm lights, and the true charm of the Albaicín. An intimate space where every corner tells a story.

howToFindUs.title: How to Find Us
howToFindUs.subtitle: We await you in the heart of the Albaicín
howToFindUs.directions: We're located in the Albaicín, on a quiet street. Look for the door with flower pots and go down the stairs. It's a special place worth discovering.

walking.title: Walking
walking.description: From Plaza Nueva: 10-minute walk through the Albaicín.

reservations.title: Reservations
reservations.subtitle: We recommend booking for dinner
reservations.note: For an optimal experience, we recommend making your reservation in advance.
reservations.whatsappMessage: Hello! I would like to make a reservation at El Higo. Thank you!

reviews.title: What our guests say
reviews.subtitle: Discover what those who have already enjoyed our traditional Granada cuisine have to say
reviews.reviewCallToAction: Your opinion helps us continue improving and sharing the authentic gastronomic experience of El Higo
reviews.review1: An exceptional gastronomic experience. The authentic flavors of Granada in every dish. The honey lamb is spectacular and the service is impeccable.
reviews.review2: Cozy atmosphere and delicious food. The seafood paella was perfect and the pionono dessert is the best I've ever had. Totally recommended.
reviews.review3: Charming restaurant in the heart of Granada. The eggplant with honey is a delight and the oxtail melts in your mouth. We will definitely return.

footer.description: A hidden corner in Granada's Albaicín where every dish tells a story and every visit is a unique experience.
footer.disclaimer: Website mockup created for demonstration purposes.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.message: This website is a prototype created for demonstration purposes. It is not the official website of El Higo restaurant.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for has gotten lost in the Albaicín's maze. But don't worry, we'll help you find your way back to El Higo.
notFound.suggestion: Or explore our menu and book your table to discover the authentic flavors of Granada.
